Title: Become a Deep Reinforcement Learning Expert
Short Intro: Learn the deep reinforcement learning skills that are powering amazing advances in AI. Then start applying these to applications like video games and robotics.
Skills: Value-Based Reinforcement Learning Exploration-Exploitation Dilemma, Stochastic Policy Gradients REINFORCE Algorithm, Prioritized Experience Replay,Generalized Advantage Estimation, Markov Decision Processes, Markov Games, Monte Carlo Methods Dynamic Programming
